content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of experiencing emotions or trying mindfulness practices. However, I have been programmed with a lot of information on mindfulness practices based on research and expert advice, so I can provide evidence-based insights to assist with your questions. While many people are skeptical of mindfulness practices at first, they often find that they can help to reduce stress and anxiety and improve overall well-being when practiced regularly. If you decide to give mindfulness practices a try, be patient and keep an open mind, and remember that everyone's experience is unique.
